Class TriPlanController

java.lang.Object
com.travelplanner.controller.TriPlanController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/trip") public class TriPlanController extends Object
Controller for handling trip-related requests.

  • Method Details

    • listTripPlans

      @GetMapping("/list") public String listTripPlans(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Displays a list of all published trip plans.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to pass data to the view.
      session - the HTTP session to check for any errors.
      Returns:
      the name of the view to display the list of trips (listTrips.html).

    • saveTrip

      @PostMapping("/save") public String saveTrip(@RequestParam Long tripId, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Saves a trip plan to the user's saved trips.
      Parameters:
      tripId - the ID of the trip to save.
      authentication - the authentication object containing the user's details.
      session - the HTTP session to store any errors.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the list of trips on failure or to the user's saved trips on success.

    • saveTripToSession

      @PostMapping("/saveToSession") public String saveTripToSession(@RequestParam Long tripId, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Saves a trip plan to the session for saving after login.
      Parameters:
      tripId - the ID of the trip to save.
      session - the HTTP session to store the trip.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the login page.

    • saveTripAfterLogin

      @GetMapping("/afterLogin") public String saveTripAfterLogin(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Saves a trip plan after the user logs in.
      Parameters:
      session - the HTTP session containing the trip to save.
      authentication - the authentication object containing the user's details.
      Returns:
      a redirect to the list of trips on failure or to the user's saved trips on success.
